item.title: Site Moved to Jekyll
item.description:
Yesterday, after auditing all of my sites, I realized that I could move this site to Jekyll and host it on Github Pages. To read about how a migration of this nature can be done, please read my blog post at: http://kernelcurry.com/blog/2014/09/08/wordpress-to-jekyll.html

This also means that this website is publicly available on Github. Please, feel free to make pull requests if you see anything that needs to be changed.

I will also be posting blog posts on this site to help people use the API. Stay tuned for my 1st blog post: "How to make a Type-Ahead completion for all card names".
